instances.prompt: Create PHOTOREALISTIC 8-second video. Shot on RED camera. Luxury corporate office interior: Modern glass building, sleek contemporary design, expensive minimalist furniture. Close-up sequence: Expensive fountain pen signing $30 million check, hands reviewing financial documents with large dollar amounts visible, stacks of investment portfolios on desk. Cut to: Modern soccer stadium construction site with cranes and "Future Home" signage. Architectural rendering visible on wall showing new stadium plans. Cinematography: Cold professional lighting, sharp business aesthetic, clean corporate documentary style, smooth gimbal movements. Style: 'The Big Short' financial documentary aesthetic - money and investment.
